definition[0]: mysterious events or situations are difficult to explain or understand
example[0]: The police are investigating the mysterious deaths of children at the hospital.
example[1]: Benson later disappeared in mysterious circumstances.
definition[1]: a mysterious person is someone who you know very little about and who seems strange or interesting
example[3]: I decided to find out more about my mysterious new neighbour.
definition[2]: someone who behaves in a mysterious way says very little about what they are doing
example[5]: She hid her thoughts behind a mysterious smile.
example[6]: Helen’s being very mysterious about her plans.
definition[3]: difficult to explain or understand, and often strange or slightly frightening
example[7]: the mysterious disappearance of ships in the waters of the Bermuda Triangle
example[9]: At first this must seem a puzzling question.
example[10]: I found her attitude deeply puzzling.
definition[5]: impossible to understand, so that you feel very confused
example[12]: Like many people, I find theoretical physics baffling.
example[13]: For some inexplicable reason her mind went completely blank.
example[14]: Some things in life are inexplicable.
definition[7]: mysterious and difficult to understand, but also often attractive or interesting – used especially about people, their expressions, or things they say
example[15]: She gave him an enigmatic smile.
definition[8]: having a meaning that is difficult to understand, and is not expressed in a clear direct way – used especially about things that people say or write
example[17]: I got a rather cryptic message from him.
definition[9]: if something is a mystery, you cannot understand how or why it happens
example[19]: Four years later, his death remains a complete mystery.
example[20]: It’s all a mystery to me.
definition[10]: if an event or a situation, especially one that happened a long time ago, is shrouded in mystery, it is mysterious because no one knows exactly what happened
example[21]: Stone age civilization, veiled in mystery as it is, has provided the greatest challenge to historians.
